data.title: about us.
data.meta_description: Campo Santo is a floral company located in Chicago's La Villita neighborhood that centers cultural traditions and new thought through floral arrangements and installations. Our client list ranges from global brands like Don Julio Tequila to New Balance and institutions such as the National Museum of Mexican Art.    loc
data.text:
Campo Santo is a floral company located in Chicago's La Villita neighborhood that centers cultural traditions and new thought through floral arrangements and installations. Our client list ranges from global brands like Don Julio Tequila to New Balance and institutions such as the National Museum of Mexican Art.

location.

2901 W Cermak Road

Chicago, IL 60623

*intersection of Cermak Road and Marshall Boulevard

hours.

friday: 8am — 2pm

saturday + sunday: 9am — 4pm

about the founder.

Lucy Angel Camarena

Lucy Angel Camarena is a very proud, born and raised Chicago girl. As a first generation, Mexican-American, she takes great pride in being able to reflect her culture in an artistic form that brings lots of family traditions and ancestry top of mind.
